Reviews.Title: “Small Average Hotel”
Reviews.Author: preekshitgupta
Reviews.Content: stayed madrid vacation 2 nights3 days overall hotel basic amenities limited resources checkin taking time proceedings size decent facilities provided business hotel hotel choose vacation bfast buffet outsourced restaurant ground floor hotel fixed menu location hotel 3 stops city center

Reviews.Title: “great”
Reviews.Author: babycakes079
Reviews.Content: hotel close 4 metro stops found downtown supermarket block little bars cheap drinks tapas hotel club location perfect front desk helpful friendly spoke english map city 2 bathroom bath tub bide definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “What a dump!”

Reviews.Content: tired hotel described dated interior service receptionist check poor waited 25 minutes whilst receptionist dealt 2 people front facade redone view window scaffold sheeting dust allowed penetrate surfaces near windows coated thin layer white standard cleanliness corners vaccumed stains corridor carpets former stuck feet bathroom bath instead white hear neighbour separating wall bathroom suspended ceiling aircon aircon noisy fan pumping ambient temperature air breakfast bar opposite reception call breakfast 70s style decor fluorescent orange loud music pumping self service read youll corner orange juice polite request met grunt run cereal milk left bottom milk jug ambivalent waitress trying 8 time dishes tables stock provisions nice madrid plenty evenings city nice stay reasonable rates definitely avoid costs
